nkhani: Chilichonse chomwe chimatenga malo komanso chokhala ndi misa
mphamvu: Kankhirani kapena kukoka zomwe zingapangitse chinthu kuti chifulumire kapena kusintha kolowera
atomu: Chigawo chaching'ono kwambiri cha zinthu chomwe chingathe kutenga nawo mbali muzochita za mankhwala
molekyu: Gulu la maatomu awiri kapena kuposerapo olumikizidwa pamodzi
chinthu: Chinthu choyera chopangidwa ndi mtundu umodzi wokha wa atomu
palimodzi: Chinthu chopangidwa ndi zinthu ziwiri kapena zingapo zosiyana zomwe zimagwirizanitsidwa pamodzi
mkhalidwe wa nkhani: Momwe zinthu zilili (zolimba, zamadzimadzi, gasi, plasma)
mphamvu yokoka: Mphamvu yomwe imakopa zinthu zolemera kwa wina ndi mzake
magnetism: Mphamvu yoyendetsedwa ndi maginito pazinthu zina
kuyenda: Kusintha kwa malo a chinthu pakapita nthawi
kuwala: Mawonekedwe amphamvu omwe amayenda ngati mafunde
phokoso: Mphamvu yamagetsi yomwe imayenda ngati mafunde kudzera mu sing'anga
kutentha: Muyezo wa kutentha kapena kuzizira kwa chinthu
nyengo: Nthawi zambiri nyengo pamalo enaake kwa nthawi yayitali
chilengedwe: Chilichonse chomwe chilipo, kuphatikiza zinthu, mphamvu, malo, ndi nthawi
chiwerengero cha anthu: Gulu la zamoyo zamtundu womwewo wokhala kudera linalake
chisinthiko: Njira yomwe kuchuluka kwa zamoyo kumasintha pakapita nthawi
dongosolo la dzuwa: Dzuwa ndi zinthu zokoka zimamangiriridwa kwa izo
mlalang'amba: Kusonkhanitsa kwakukulu kwa nyenyezi, mpweya, ndi fumbi
